name: TheRedVillageGenesis
description:
The Red Village is a brutal dark fantasy play-to-earn blockchain game on the Polygon network. Official link to Champions: [Champions](https://opensea.io/collection/theredvillagechampions)
Official link to Blood Portal: [Blood Portal](https://opensea.io/collection/theredvillagebloodportal)
Official link to Bones: [Bones](https://opensea.io/collection/theredvillagebones)
